articles.title: Scam Alert
articles.description: The Pi Exchange app is not launched by the @PiCoreTeam!. Do not access with your Pi account and do not log into the Pi mnemonic on any third party application that requires a 24-word mnemonic pharse other than the wallet.pi on the Pi app and pi Browser!. Doing so may lead to the loss of all of your Pi coins.
